item.title: How to create a chess app in flutter
item.description: How to create a chess app in flutter In this post, I’m going to explain how to create a basic chess app with Flutter. For this app I used the RiverPod state manager, you probably already know what it is, if not, just click on this link to learn more about it. Creating the project To create a Flutter project we simply write: flutter create chess_app How to create a chess board app in flutter First of all to create a chess we need the chessboard, for that, fortunately Deven Joshi created a package/widget that allows us to create and play in a chessboard, that is called flutter_chess_board package.
